tool.name: CloudGen (ARFF)
tool.description: Generation of a toy data set

param.name: number_of_examples
param.help: Number of examples that should be generated (typically between 10 and 10,000 when used for learning)
param.label: Number of examples

param.name: number_of_features
param.help: Length of the feature vector for each example (typically between 1 and 20).
param.label: Number of dimensions

param.name: fraction_positive
param.help: The fraction of examples which are positive (typically between 0.1 and 0.9).
param.label: Fraction of positive examples

param.name: spread
param.help: The spread of points around the center of each cloud
param.label: Spread
